About Me

Who am i...

I have a degree in Interior and Product Design from Universidade Lusófona de Humanidades e Tecnologias. I finished my course in 2005 and, during my degree, I reconciled my studies with the role of monitor of the Design, Architecture and Urbanism workshops in an after-work regime, at the same Faculty. After the course, and due to the lack of job offers in my area of ​​training, I chose to start my career in sales, having gone through different areas, from telecommunications, fine art products, optics, etc. , currently being the commercial representative of the leading brand in Portugal of office chairs, Alital, S.A. However, I am a technology lover and I always try to be up to date with the sector's news, and, in 2021, I decided to bet heavily on this passion and started several courses in Web Development and JavaScript. This site is my first project!

Interests

TRAVELING

By traveling we open our horizons. Discover new places, new mentalities, new ways of approaching situations and solving problems. I consider an investment as important as any training.

TECHNOLOGY

I have always identified with technology. I finally started in the area of ​​Web Development and programming and I consider it to be the best personal investment I've made so far. It's constantly evolving and that's challenging.

MOTORCYCLE

I think it has the same results as traveling, but on 2 wheels. Total freedom, challenges and constant learning. On a motorcycle, inside the helmet is probably one of the best places to plan and outline projects.
